title: Himi 7
lyrics:
4-6’s& 2-8’s
1.
Ke mou fakaongo
‘A e Lami lelei,
‘A hotau ‘Otua
Ko e hifo ia;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.
2.
‘A e kau pōpula
Ki he angahala,
Mo heli, mou ma’u
Homou ‘atāina;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.
3.
Pea ke mou nofo
‘O fiemālie
‘I ho’omou tui
Ki he Eiki lelei;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.
4.
Mo kimoutolu na
Na’a mou fakatau,
‘A homou ‘api tō
Mou ha’u ‘o toe ma’u;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.
5.
Ko e fu’u ‘ofa
‘Ofa tu’unga’a pē,
‘A Sīsū totonu
Ko hotau Huhu’i;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli. *
